title: Get a Business Messaging Webhook configuration

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: ID of your developer application. To find the App ID , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: secret
parameters.description: Secret of your developer application. To find the Secret , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: event_type
parameters.description: The type of Webhook event that you subscribe to. Enum value: DIRECT_MESSAGE : Business Messaging events. To learn more about the schema and sample payload of the events within this event category, see Webhook schema .
